items.title: Happy Labs Wiki
items.headline: Welcome to the Hotel Story Wiki
items.desc:
Expand your resort, upgrade your facilities and see who can be the best hotelier online!

Want to learn more about the game? Need more information regarding "items" perhaps? The Hotel Story Wiki is where you can find information regarding this addicting game. Stay up to date on the latest news and updates. Learn about the intricacies of the game. Share strategies. Get tips and tricks. Ask questions. Get answers from experts. Help us gather information on the facilities.
